channel.title: Fluff – A DevOps Blog
channel.description: Occasionally a developer makes an Oops!

item.title: Welcome to A DevOoops
item.dc:creator: Geoff Wagner
item.description: As developers, we are always under the gun to get X feature shipped, or to get Y Sev 1 resolved as quickly as possible. Sometimes in that quest to service our corpo overlords, an Ooops happens in the middle. That…
item.content:encoded:
As developers, we are always under the gun to get X feature shipped, or to get Y Sev 1 resolved as quickly as possible. Sometimes in that quest to service our corpo overlords, an Ooops happens in the middle. That is where this blog comes in!

I want to talk about technology abstracted from the corporate atmosphere. There are some really cool things going on out there in space of Development and DevOps, and all that coolness rarely sees the light of day. Let’s give it some air here and see what happens
